titleStmt.title: On the thunder, happening after the solemnity of the coronation of Charles the II. on St. George's Day. 1661.
titleStmt.author: Bold, Henry, 1627-1683.

notesStmt.note: Signed: Hen. Bold, olim e N.C. Oxon.
Verse: "Heavens! vve thank you, that you thundred so! ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
